description: Enjoy this damaged doll anal sex fantasy scene, written and directed by Skin Diamond herself! Tommy pistol is a deranged sex fiend with a fetish for love dolls. The latest addition to his collection is a beautiful Black damaged doll he calls Skin. His touch brings the doll to life, allowing him to live out all of his deviant sexual desires.
title: Doll House: Skin Diamond, Tommy Pistol
